    • loginWith2FA

      public boolean loginWith2FA(AuthRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpRequest, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse httpResponse)
      Attempts to authenticate a user with username, password, and (optionally) a TOTP code if 2FA is enabled.
      Specified by:
      loginWith2FA in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      request - the authentication request containing username, password, and totpCode
      httpRequest - the current HTTP request (used to access session and security context)
      httpResponse - the current HTTP response (used to store security context)
      Returns:
      true if authentication succeeds (including 2FA if required), false otherwise

    • generateMfaSecret

      public String generateMfaSecret(Long userId)
      Generates a new TOTP secret for the given user, and stores it in the user's account. This does not activate 2FA yet — verification is still required.
      Specified by:
      generateMfaSecret in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user for whom the secret is being generated
      Returns:
      the newly generated Base32-encoded TOTP secret, or null if the user doesn't exist

    • verifyAndEnableMfa

      public boolean verifyAndEnableMfa(Long userId, String totpCode)
      Verifies the provided TOTP code against the user's secret and enables 2FA if the code is valid.
      Specified by:
      verifyAndEnableMfa in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user attempting to verify and activate 2FA
      totpCode - the TOTP code provided by the user from their authenticator app
      Returns:
      true if the code is valid and 2FA was successfully activated; false otherwise

    • verifyTotp

      public boolean verifyTotp(Long userId, String totpCode)
      Verifies a TOTP code against the user's active secret (only if 2FA is already enabled).
      Specified by:
      verifyTotp in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user attempting verification
      totpCode - the code to be verified
      Returns:
      true if the code is valid; false if invalid, expired, or user is not 2FA-enabled

    • disableMfa

      public boolean disableMfa(Long userId)
      Specified by:
      disableMfa in interface UserService
